scripts.typeorm:run-migrations: npm run build && npm run typeorm migration:run -- -d ./dist/config/typeorm.config.js
scripts.typeorm:generate-migration: npm run build && npm run typeorm -- -d ./dist/config/typeorm.config.js migration:generate ./src/migrations/$npm_config_name
scripts.typeorm:create-migration: npm run build && npm run typeorm -- migration:create ./src/migrations/$npm_config_name
scripts.typeorm:revert-migration: npm build && npm run typeorm -- -d ./dist/config/typeorm.config.js migration:revert
